# Public Assets

## icon.png

Please add a 128x128 PNG icon for the CleanRead extension.

You can create one using:
- Design tools (Figma, Sketch, Photoshop)
- Icon generators (favicon.io, realfavicongenerator.net)
- Simple geometric shapes with text "CR" or "CleanRead"

For development, you can use a placeholder icon from:
```bash
# Download a simple placeholder (requires internet)
curl -o icon.png "https://via.placeholder.com/128/2196F3/FFFFFF?text=CR"
```

Or create a simple SVG and convert to PNG using online tools.
